title: Why do transactions not complete on Apple's Sandbox Testing Environment?

sections.title: Symptoms
content: • Transactions do not complete on Apple's Sandbox Testing Environment.

sections.title: Cause
content: This can happen when the Sandbox store is down for maintenance. Sometimes it can also be caused when the Sandbox test account becomes corrupted.

sections.title: Resolution
content: Please search on the Apple Developer Forums for any Sandbox status concerns, or create a new Sandbox Test Account.
